A-Profiles¶

Welcome to A-Profiles documentation!

Image of attenuated backscatter profiles.¶

A-Profiles is a python library dedicated to the analysis of atmospheric profilers measurements.

From elastic measurements performed by Lidars and/or ceilometers, A-Profiles provides a clouds detection, a planetary boundary layer height retrieval, and aerosol extinction calculation using some a priori.

A-Profiles supports E-PROFILE data reading. This library is used by V-Profiles.
